quoteFirst: But the struggle was not finished; and its dying agony has been a most shocking tragedy. According to your statement, a man who knew you and who was seeking to get into touch with you, was killed at
quoteLast: , most likely by Essarès Bey, who dreaded his intervention. And, five hours later, at twenty-three past twelve, Essarès Bey himself was murdered, presumably by one of his accomplices. There is the whole story, Captain Belval.
title: The Golden Triangle: The Return of Arsène Lupin
author: Leblanc, Maurice, 1864-1941

quoteFirst: He stood utterly dumfounded. His eyes had fastened on a large clock which he saw, through the window, on one of the buildings in the yard, marking
quoteLast: ; and he mechanically repeated these figures, attributing a documentary value to them. Then he asked himself--so unreal did the scene appear to him--if all this was true and if the crime had not been penetrated within himself, in the depths of his aching heart.
title: The Golden Triangle: The Return of Arsène Lupin
